headline.main: UK's Cameron Defends Free Speech 'Right to Cause Offense'
headline.print_headline: UK's Cameron Defends Free Speech 'Right to Cause Offense'

docs.lead_paragraph: British Prime Minister David Cameron said there was "a right to cause offense about someone's religion" in a free society, drawing a distinction between himself and Pope Francis in their response to the deadly Islamist attacks in Paris.
docs.snippet: British Prime Minister David Cameron said there was "a right to cause offense about someone's religion" in a free society, drawing a distinction between himself and Pope Francis in their response to the deadly Islamist attacks in Paris....

docs.lead_paragraph: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe arrives in Israel accompanied by a government and business delegation, meets Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
docs.snippet: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe arrives in Israel accompanied by a government and business delegation, meets Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....

headline.main: Next Talks on Iran's Nuclear Program Set for Early Feb.: Chinese Envoy
headline.print_headline: Next Talks on Iran's Nuclear Program Set for Early Feb.: Chinese Envoy

docs.lead_paragraph: The next round of negotiations on Iran's nuclear program is set for early February, but the venue has not been decided, China's envoy said on Sunday, as an all-day meeting in Geneva ended with what diplomats said was "limited" progress.
docs.snippet: The next round of negotiations on Iran's nuclear program is set for early February, but the venue has not been decided, China's envoy said on Sunday, as an all-day meeting in Geneva ended with what diplomats said was "limited" progress....

headline.main: Rebel Leader Arrested in Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: Rebel Leader Arrested in Central African Republic

docs.lead_paragraph: A leader of Central African Republic's anti-Balaka Christian militia, a widely feared commander who has been implicated in attacks on civilians throughout the battle-scarred country, has been arrested, a justice official said Sunday.
docs.snippet: A leader of Central African Republic's anti-Balaka Christian militia, a widely feared commander who has been implicated in attacks on civilians throughout the battle-scarred country, has been arrested, a justice official said Sunday....

headline.main: JetBlue: Flight Forced to Abort Takeoff at Kennedy Airport
headline.print_headline: JetBlue: Flight Forced to Abort Takeoff at Kennedy Airport

docs.lead_paragraph: JetBlue says one of its planes aborted a takeoff at Kennedy International Airport when another aircraft suddenly crossed the runway.
docs.snippet: JetBlue says one of its planes aborted a takeoff at Kennedy International Airport when another aircraft suddenly crossed the runway....

headline.main: Eastwood's 'American Sniper' Wins Big in U.S. Box Office Battle
headline.print_headline: Eastwood's 'American Sniper' Wins Big in U.S. Box Office Battle

docs.lead_paragraph: Oscar-nominated war film "American Sniper" led U.S. and Canadian box office charts over the weekend with a record-smashing $90.2 million in ticket sales, according to studio estimates.
docs.snippet: Oscar-nominated war film "American Sniper" led U.S. and Canadian box office charts over the weekend with a record-smashing $90.2 million in ticket sales, according to studio estimates....

headline.main: Poland May Help Swiss Franc Mortgage Holders-Deputy PM
headline.print_headline: Poland May Help Swiss Franc Mortgage Holders-Deputy PM

docs.lead_paragraph: The Polish government may support borrowers with mortgages in Swiss francs if that currency stays above the 4 zloty level in the longer term, Deputy Prime Minister Janusz Piechocinski said on Sunday.
docs.snippet: The Polish government may support borrowers with mortgages in Swiss francs if that currency stays above the 4 zloty level in the longer term, Deputy Prime Minister Janusz Piechocinski said on Sunday....

headline.main: Peyton Manning to Miss Pro Bowl With Thigh Injury
headline.print_headline: Peyton Manning to Miss Pro Bowl With Thigh Injury

docs.lead_paragraph: As Peyton Manning ponders his football future, he's concluded one thing: He won't play in the Pro Bowl next weekend in Glendale, Arizona.
docs.snippet: As Peyton Manning ponders his football future, he's concluded one thing: He won't play in the Pro Bowl next weekend in Glendale, Arizona....

headline.main: Pope meets grief-stricken father of girl killed at Tacloban mass
headline.sub: Pope meets grief-stricken father of girl killed at Tacloban mass

docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis meets the grieving father of a girl who was killed on Saturday when a piece of scaffolding fell on her at a mass in Tacloban, Philippines. Nathan Frandino reports.
docs.snippet: Pope Francis meets the grieving father of a girl who was killed on Saturday when a piece of scaffolding fell on her at a mass in Tacloban, Philippines. Nathan Frandino reports....
